files.patch:
@@ -370,1 +370,1 @@ -Mac OS X 10.13 (High Sierra) +macOS 13 (Ventura) @@ -467,3 +467,2 @@ -

It is recommended that you use at least Mac OS X 10.13 (High Sierra). -At the time of writing, the JDK has been successfully compiled on macOS -10.12 (Sierra).

+

It is recommended that you use at least macOS 13 (Ventura) and Xcode +14, but earlier versions may also work.

@@ -548,1 +547,1 @@ -Apple Xcode 10.1 (using clang 10.0.0) +Apple Xcode 14.3.1 (using clang 14.0.3)

@@ -170,1 +170,1 @@
-| macOS             | Mac OS X 10.13 (High Sierra)       |
+| macOS             | macOS 13 (Ventura)                 |
@@ -273,2 +273,2 @@
-It is recommended that you use at least Mac OS X 10.13 (High Sierra). At the time
-of writing, the JDK has been successfully compiled on macOS 10.12 (Sierra).
+It is recommended that you use at least macOS 13 (Ventura) and Xcode
+14, but earlier versions may also work.
@@ -340,1 +340,1 @@
-| macOS              | Apple Xcode 10.1 (using clang 10.0.0)      |
+| macOS              | Apple Xcode 14.3.1 (using clang 14.0.3)    |
